Test Case: Verify application on different Operating System.
Verify application with different hardware configuration
Verify application with different internet connection.
Verify application with No internet connection.
Verify end to end functionality of the application.
Verify the application UI like Text Alignment,font size,image etc
Verify the application Usability (Check the broken links)
Verify security of the application like SQL injection,Scripting
Verify all messages is showing properly
Verify the performance of the application
Verify the application's different version with different OS
Verify the application when new version is available/upgraded
Verify the application by deleteing its storage file and check the behaviour
